Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: This Workflow retrieves employee data from BambooHR, maps and formats it, then checks if the employee exists in Sage 300 People. If not, it creates the employee in Sage 300 People and updates a key-value store to track success or failure.

Properties.Name: JobLookupTable
Properties.Value: Chief Operating Officer 1 VP of People 5 HR Administrator 10 Sr. HR Administrator 11

Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the sample operation.
Properties.Name: OperationId

Properties.Description: A brief description or summary of the operation.
Properties.Name: Description

Properties.Description: {fields} is a comma separated list of values taken from the official list of field names.
Properties.Name: fields

Properties.Description: {id} is an employee ID. The special employee ID of zero (0) means to use the employee ID associated with the API key (if any).
Properties.Name: id

Properties.Description: Setting to false will return future dated values from history table fields.
Properties.Name: onlyCurrent
Data

Properties.Name: Mapping
Properties.Value:
{"mappedElements":[{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee"},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/CompanyCode","mapExpression":""001""},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/CompanyRuleCode","mapExpression":""P_MONTH""},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/id"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/EmployeeCode","mapExpression":""BAM_B" + {id}"},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/GenEntityTypeCode","mapExpression":""INDV""},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/GenEntitySubTypeCode","mapExpression":""EMPL""},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/PaymentRunDefCode","mapExpression":""CASH""},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/RemunerationEarnDefCode","mapExpression":""SALARY""},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/LeavePolicyCode","mapExpression":""STANDARD""},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/TitleTypeCode","mapExpression":""ADV""},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/gender"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/Gender","mapExpression":"LEFT({gender}, 1)"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/firstName"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/Initials","mapExpression":"LEFT({firstName}, 1)"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/firstName"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/FirstName"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/lastName"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/LastName"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/middleName"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/SecondName"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/maritalStatus"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/MaritalStatusTypeCode","mapExpression":"LOOKUP({maritalStatus}, "MaritalLookup", "Name", "TypeID", "NotAvailable")"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/dateOfBirth"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/BirthDate","mapExpression":"FORMATDATE(DATEVALUE({dateOfBirth}, "yyyy-MM-dd"), "yyyy/MM/dd")"},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/LanguageTypeCode","mapExpression":""ENG""},{"sourcePaths":[],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/NationalityCountryCode","mapExpression":""USD""},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/ethnicity"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/RacialGroup","mapExpression":"LEFT({ethnicity}, 1)"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/ssn"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/PassportNo"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/payRate"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/AnnualSalary","mapExpression":"LEFT({payRate}, FIND(" ", {payRate}))"},{"sourcePaths":["Root/Employee/jobTitle"],"targetPath":"Root/Employee/jobTitleTypeID","mapExpression":"CINT(NUMBERVALUE(LOOKUP({jobTitle}, "JobLookup", "Name", "TypeID", Properties.Name: JobLookup
Properties.Value: Chief Operating Officer 1 VP of People 5 HR Administrator 10 Sr. HR Administrator 11

Properties.Name: Response
Properties.Value: { "success": true, "message": "Employee with Employee Code EMPAPI_B142 created successfully." }

Name: BambooHR To Sage 300 People Employees
Description: This Workflow retrieves employee data from BambooHR, maps and formats it, then checks if the employee exists in Sage 300 People. If not, it creates the employee in Sage 300 People and updates a key-value store to track success or failure.
